thread.section_title: American Advisors Group Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of American Advisors Group | americanadvisorsgroup.com
thread.title: Cheri
thread.title_full: American Advisors Group reviewed by Cheri

author: Cheri
title: Cheri
text: The entire process with American Advisors Group was professional, efficient, and personable. Andrea Tweedie is an excellent associate. All communication was clear, service was prompt, and she constantly kept me informed of the process and the progress. Her assistant Marisol was also excellent. I have already recommended AAG to others, and will continue to do so. You are fortunate to have excellent employees like Andrea.
